mapper.select: select hno as "hno", change_date as "changeDate", sh.rno as "rno", next_status as "nextStatus", status_name as "statusName", reply as "reply", dist_source as "distSource", writer as "writer" from status_histories sh, status s where sh.next_status = s.status_no and sh.rno = #{rno} order by change_date asc
select fno as "fno", saved_date as "savedDate", file_name as "fileName", file_type as "fileType", file_data as "fileData", hno as "hno" from status_histories_files where hno = #{hno}

select rno as "rno", req_date as "reqDate", req_title as "reqTitle", req_content as "reqContent", client as "client", mname as "clientName", r.sno as "sno", system_name as "systemName", req_expect_date as "reqExpectDate", r.status_no as "statusNo", status_name as "statusName", m.organ as "organ" from requests r, status s, systems sy, members m where s.status_no = r.status_no and r.sno = sy.sno and r.client = m.mid and rno = #{rno}

select rno as "rno", req_type as "reqType", priority as "priority", dev_expect_date as "devExpectDate", test_expect_date as "testExpectDate", dist_expect_date as "distExpectDate", all_expect_date as "allExpectDate", usertest_expect_date as "userTestExpectDate", dev_comp_date as "devCompDate", test_comp_date as "testCompDate", dist_comp_date as "distCompDate", all_comp_date as "allCompDate", usertest_comp_date as "userTestCompDate", pm as "pm", developer as "developer", tester as "tester", distributor as "distributor", user_tester as "userTester" from request_process where rno = #{rno}

select fno as "fno", saved_date as "savedDate", file_name as "fileName", file_type as "fileType", file_data as "fileData", sh.hno as "hno" from status_histories sh, status_histories_files shf where sh.hno = shf.hno and sh.rno = #{rno} and sh.next_status = 1
mapper.update:
update request_process
all_expect_date = #{expectDate},
dev_expect_date = #{expectDate},
test_expect_date = #{expectDate},
usertest_expect_date = #{expectDate},
dist_expect_date = #{expectDate}
where rno = #{rno}

update request_process
all_comp_date = sysdate,
dev_comp_date = sysdate,
test_comp_date = sysdate,
usertest_comp_date = sysdate,
dist_comp_date = sysdate
where rno = #{rno}
update request_process set dev_comp_date = null, dev_expect_date = null, test_expect_date = null where rno = #{rno}
mapper.insert:
SELECT seq_status_histories.nextval FROM dual
insert into status_histories (hno, change_date, rno, reply, next_status, dist_source, writer) values (#{hno}, sysdate, #{rno}, #{reply}, #{nextStatus}, #{distSource}, #{writer})
mapper.select: select count(*) from requests where status_no = 1 or status_no = 11
select count(*) from request_process rp, requests r where rp.rno = r.rno and r.STATUS_NO = 3 and developer = #{mid}
select count(*) from requests where status_no = 12

select count(*) from requests r, request_process rp, status s, systems sy where r.rno = rp.rno and r.status_no = s.status_no and r.sno = sy.sno and all_expect_date <= sysdate + 7 and all_comp_date is null

select r.rno as "rno", r.sno as "sno", system_name as "systemName", req_type as "reqType", priority as "priority", req_date as "reqDate", req_title as "reqTitle", status_name as "statusName", all_expect_date as "allExpectDate" from requests r, request_process rp, status s, systems sy where r.rno = rp.rno and r.status_no = s.status_no and r.sno = sy.sno and all_expect_date <= sysdate + 7 and all_comp_date is null order by all_expect_date OFFSET (#{dPager.pageNo} - 1) * #{dPager.rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{dPager.rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

select count(*) from request_process
and ALL_EXPECT_DATE is not null and ALL_COMP_DATE is not null
DEVELOPER = #{mid} and DEV_EXPECT_DATE is not null and DEV_COMP_DATE is not null
TESTER = #{mid} and TEST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and TEST_COMP_DATE is not null
USER_TESTER = #{mid} and USERTEST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and USERTEST_COMP_DATE is not null
DISTRIBUTOR = #{mid} and DIST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and DIST_COMP_DATE is not null

select count(*) from request_process
and ALL_EXPECT_DATE is not null and ALL_COMP_DATE is not null and ALL_EXPECT_DATE < ALL_COMP_DATE
DEVELOPER = #{mid} and DEV_EXPECT_DATE is not null and DEV_COMP_DATE is not null and DEV_EXPECT_DATE < DEV_COMP_DATE
TESTER = #{mid} and TEST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and TEST_COMP_DATE is not null and TEST_EXPECT_DATE < TEST_COMP_DATE
USER_TESTER = #{mid} and USERTEST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and USERTEST_COMP_DATE is not null and USERTEST_EXPECT_DATE < USERTEST_COMP_DATE
DISTRIBUTOR = #{mid} and DIST_EXPECT_DATE is not null and DIST_COMP_DATE is not null and DIST_EXPECT_DATE < DIST_COMP_DATE
select fno, file_name as "fileName", file_data as "fileData", file_type as "fileType" from STATUS_HISTORIES_FILES where FNO = #{fno}

select count(*) from requests r, systems s
r.sno = s.sno and r.client = #{member.mid}
and status_no between 1 and 11
and status_no = 13
and status_no = 12
order by r.req_date desc

select r.rno as "rno", req_title as "reqTitle", system_name as "systemName", req_date as "reqDate", status_no as "statusNo" from requests r, systems s

and status_no between 1 and 11
and status_no = 13

order by r.req_date desc OFFSET (#{uPager.pageNo} - 1) * #{uPager.rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{uPager.rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
